entries.meaning: (chemistry) The process of cyclizing, of becoming or causing to become aromatic.
examples: "The dehydrogenation reactions may involve isomerization and cyclization as well as the formation of olefins and unsaturated compounds generally."

entries.meaning: (chemistry) Any reaction that results in the formation of a ring. ring closure
examples: "It is convenient to run the cyclizations at a temperature between 25° C. and 100° C."
